content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) 

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a lab and connected entities such as a burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) and a chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5)

### Iron plate smelter at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when setting recipe to lab
- Ensure that the lab is a valid entity that can have its recipe set before attempting to set the recipe.
### Errors when placing entity at occupied position
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities can be connected before attempting to connect them.
### Errors when researching technology
- Ensure that the research is valid and can be set before attempting to set the research.
### Errors when refueling drill
- Ensure that there is enough fuel in the inventory before attempting to refuel the drill.
### Errors when smelting items
- Ensure that there are enough ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt items.
### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure that the chest is not full before attempting to use the burner inserter.
### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a valid fluid system before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using boiler
- Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a valid fluid system and has enough input liquid before attempting to use it.
